cause.description:
Experience: Attorney General of Virginia Governor of Virginia Chairman of the Republican National Committee Chairman of a national commission on prevention and response to terrorism
Issues: On the issues, Jim Gilmore is a leader Republicans can trust to stand for low taxes, secure borders, support for our troops, protection of our 2nd Amendment rights, the preservation of life and the defense of traditional marriage and family values.
Learn more about Jim Gilmore on the Issues at www.gilmoreforpresident.com
Spread the word! GILMORE FOR PRESIDENT 2008!!!
1. Jim Gilmore for President
2. http://www.gilmoreforpresident.com/issues.php
cause.mission: Help a true conservative win the Republican nomination and then later the White House!
cause.name: Jim Gilmore For President
